regen.absent_element: method of displaying identity information to the controller
regen.new_specification: The system shall clearly display the functional identity information on the controller's interface, ensuring it's easily readable and accessible during operation.

regen.absent_element: notification to the controller if the call fails
regen.new_specification: If the system fails to connect the call, the controller shall also be notified of the failure.

regen.absent_element: assurance of secure and reliable connection parameters for calls
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that the call connection parameters meet security and quality standards before attempting to establish the call.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call was not received by the controller.
